note.p: Surgeon. Staff surgeon in the army, reaching the rank of major. Retired with the honorary rank of deputy inspector-general of hospitals in 1861. Son of Henry Hadley (1762–1830) and Susanna Hadley.
Census returns of England and Wales 1861 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG9/56/54/18)
Derbyshire, England, select Church of England parish registers, 1538–1910 (Ancestry.com, accessed 16 February 2017)
Gloucestershire, England, Church of England burials, 1813–1988 (Ancestry.com, accessed 16 February 2017)
